ygData.subject: Re: Staff of Observe/FBR/ROO
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, If you think i level so fast its because I don t camp for any special items. For level 24-29 find a wiz partner to hunt evil eyes in Beholder. Awesome loot
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,

If you think i level so fast its because I don't camp for any special
items.

For level 24-29 find a wiz partner to hunt evil eyes in Beholder.
Awesome loot (money, gems, polished bone hoop, polished bone bracelet
[rare]) and pretty good xp.

Then level 29 onwards hunt Treants (about 3 Min spawn time & very little
HP) hunt until they give no xp.

The money you get from Treants (usually 1 pp to 5pp & occasional Fine
Steel great staff) can pay the good items you want to buy, you get very good
xp (as compared to dungeons whereby i hunt 2 days in Mistmoore cannot be
compared to 4 hours of Treants so you save a lot of time).


Mazy
Level 33 Erudite Wizard
Prexus

----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
